_sText:
slide_prefab.vmf:

you need to copy a triggers in order, it's very important to follow the order, otherwise it will be possible to jump on the slide if you press +duck and +jump.

1. Copy filter_activator_name, player_speedmod, trigger_multiple(start_reset) and put them all at start.

2. Copy trigger_teleport(main_slide) and put it at slide place. (if you'll have not just straight slide, then you need to combine every trigger_teleport(main_slide) that related to one slide).

3. Copy trigger_multiple(main_slide2) and put it at slide place. (if you'll have not just straight slide, then you need to combine every trigger_multiple(main_slide2) that related to one slide).

if you need a booster:

4. Copy trigger_multiple(boostslide) and put it at the end of slide.

Repeat from step 2. for every new slide.

An example of how all this should work you can check if you'll open source_slide.vmf or bhop_retrowave(CS:S)
wallrun_prefab.vmf:

WARNING: wallrun can stop the player if two players will jump into one trigger at the same time!

1. Copy everything in wallrun_prefab.vmf to your map.

2. trigger_multiple(wallrun) move/copy at your wall.

If you need a booster:

3. Copy from slide_prefab.vmf

If you need more wallrun slides, just repeat step 2.

Don't use toolsplayerclip texture for func_movelinear(stop_slide) otherwise you will be stopped, I donâ€™t know why is this happening, you can just create a transparent texture.
